_meta.note: Tarot derived from drug field — there is no separate tarot column in the CSV

2c-b.name: 2C-B
2c-b.effects_summary: Phenethylamine psychedelic producing vivid visual fractals and heightened sensory clarity. Emotionally lucid with a strong body feeling.

narrative_template.general: Colour becomes music. Every surface shimmers with mathematical precision. You are inside the equation.

acacia.name: Acacia
acacia.effects_summary: DMT-containing sacred tree used in Aboriginal shamanism. Produces intense visionary states and encounters with the ineffable.

narrative_template.general: The tree speaks. Its roots reach through sixty thousand years of memory. You are held in the Dreamtime.

alcohol.name: Alcohol
alcohol.effects_summary: Fermented ethanol producing warmth, social ease, and progressive sedation. Gravity increases. Edges soften.

narrative_template.general: The room tilts gently. Time slows to amber. You are warm and slightly imprecise, like a beloved photograph.

ancestral trance.name: Ancestral Trance
ancestral trance.effects_summary: Rhythm-induced altered state. No chemical vector — pure percussive resonance opens the veil. Used across Haitian Vodou and Aboriginal ceremony.

narrative_template.general: The drum is a door. Your ancestors step through it. You have been here before — before language, before memory.

arundo donax.name: Arundo Donax
arundo donax.effects_summary: Giant reed plant with possible psychoactive alkaloids. Mild, ambiguous effects. Sacred to some indigenous traditions.

narrative_template.general: A soft green haze. The wind through reeds. Something is almost there, just beyond the peripheral.

ashwagandha.name: Ashwagandha
ashwagandha.effects_summary: Ancient Ayurvedic root that reduces cortisol and promotes calm sustained energy. The absence of noise is itself profound.

narrative_template.general: The noise in your body recedes. You become the stillness beneath the music. The Hermit has found his cave.

ayahuasca.name: Ayahuasca
ayahuasca.effects_summary: Sacred Amazonian DMT brew. Produces full-reality dissolution, encounters with entities, and confrontation with the deepest self. Not recreational. Transformative.

narrative_template.general: The vine drinks you. You are unspooled across ten thousand years. The serpent was always your spine.

benadryl.name: Benadryl
benadryl.effects_summary: Anticholinergic antihistamine producing dry delirium, shadow figures, and impossible conversations with people who are not there.

narrative_template.general: Someone just said your name. You look. Nobody is there. The phone is ringing but it isn't. Your mouth is chalk.

bhang.name: Bhang
bhang.effects_summary: Sacred cannabis preparation consumed in Hindu ceremony. Milk-dissolved hashish producing dreamy devotional states and dissolving ordinary care.

narrative_template.general: Shiva's gift. The mind becomes river — always moving, never troubled. The dancefloor is a temple tonight.

brahmi.name: Brahmi
brahmi.effects_summary: Ayurvedic cognitive herb (Bacopa monnieri) enhancing memory and reducing anxiety over time. Gentle, cumulative, intelligent.

narrative_template.general: Your thoughts arrive with unusual clarity. Memory opens like a drawer you forgot you had.

bufotenin.name: Bufotenin
bufotenin.effects_summary: Toad-secreted tryptamine producing sudden, overwhelming psychedelia. No preparation can ready you. The Tower strikes without warning.

narrative_template.general: Lightning through your spine. Reality cracks open. You are being rebuilt from incorrect materials. Hold on.

caffeine.name: Caffeine
caffeine.effects_summary: Global morning ritual. Adenosine blocker producing focused alertness, warmth, and the illusion that today will be different.

narrative_template.general: The sun rises inside you. Sharp edges, warm light. The world makes sense again, at least until it doesn't.

cbd.name: CBD
cbd.effects_summary: Non-psychoactive cannabinoid modulating anxiety and inflammation. The calm without the trip. Grounded, terrestrial.

narrative_template.general: The edge of the knife is still. You breathe without the catch in your chest. This is what normal feels like.

chewing tobacco.name: Chewing Tobacco
chewing tobacco.effects_summary: Oral tobacco producing sustained nicotine absorption and mild stimulation. Slower, earthier, more ancient than a cigarette.

narrative_template.general: The nicotine pools slow. Time lengthens. You are patient now, the way the earth is patient.

clear pill.name: Clear Pill
clear pill.effects_summary: The Milady substance — clarity, sobriety-adjacent, hyper-cognitive mode with no psychedelic distortion. Seeing through the veil without dissolving into it.

narrative_template.general: Everything is exactly what it is. No colour shift. No warp. Just the present moment, stripped to its architecture.

coca.name: Coca
coca.effects_summary: Sacred Andean leaf chewed for millennia. Sustained mild stimulation, altitude adjustment, and ceremonial connection to the land.

narrative_template.general: The green leaf is ancient medicine. You feel the mountain's heartbeat. Slow energy rises like altitude itself.

cocaine.name: Cocaine
cocaine.effects_summary: Refined coca alkaloid producing explosive euphoria, grandiosity, and acute cardiovascular stimulation. The Emperor believes he has arrived.

narrative_template.general: You are the most interesting person in every room. The music was written specifically for you. This feeling is permanent.

coffee.name: Coffee
coffee.effects_summary: The drink that created modernity. Sufi monasteries, coffeehouses, revolutions. Warm alertness and the comfort of ritual.

narrative_template.general: Warm amber rises. Thought arrives in clean lines. The coffehouse has always been where revolution was planned.

datura.name: Datura
datura.effects_summary: Tropane alkaloid nightshade. The most dangerous plant on this list. Produces full delirium, impossible conversations, and complete amnesia. Not a party drug.

narrative_template.general: You cannot tell what is real. People you love are standing in the room but their faces are wrong. Your hands will not obey you.

dextroamphetamine.name: Dextroamphetamine
dextroamphetamine.effects_summary: Refined amphetamine salt producing intense focused drive and euphoric productivity. The Chariot does not slow down.

narrative_template.general: Thought accelerates beyond speech. You have seventeen plans. The first three are already complete. This is sustainable.

dmt.name: DMT
dmt.effects_summary: Dimethyltryptamine. The breakthrough molecule. 15 minutes of impossible geometry and encounters with entities beyond language. You asked for this.

narrative_template.general: You are somewhere else. It is not somewhere else — it was always here. The geometric beings regard you with patient familiarity.

ephedra.name: Ephedra
ephedra.effects_summary: Ancient alkaloid-rich plant, the ancestor of amphetamines. Sustained clean energy with slight cardiovascular elevation.

narrative_template.general: Clean electricity through tired muscles. The plant has been here since before history. So has this feeling.

estrogen.name: Estrogen
estrogen.effects_summary: Feminizing hormone shifting perception, affect, and embodiment over time. Slow alchemical transformation from within.

narrative_template.general: The body renegotiates its terms. Colour shifts slowly toward something more true. You are becoming.

ethanol.name: Ethanol
ethanol.effects_summary: Pure alcohol — same spirit, different name. The molecule that built civilisations and destroyed them. It does not lie about what it is.

narrative_template.general: The edges of the night curve gently inward. You are loose in your skin. Something important has been set down.

ethylene.name: Ethylene
ethylene.effects_summary: Sweet-smelling gas used in ancient Delphi. The Oracle of the Pythia breathed it from rock fissures and delivered prophecy. You are not the Pythia. Maybe.

narrative_template.general: The vapour rises from the fissure. You speak without choosing your words. What comes out may be true.

euphoria.name: Euphoria
euphoria.effects_summary: The state itself as substance. When the music, the crowd, the night, and whatever you took converge into a singular moment of rightness.

narrative_template.general: This is it. This is the moment you were in the entire time. You have arrived at the centre of the night.

grayanotoxin.name: Grayanotoxin
grayanotoxin.effects_summary: Mad honey toxin from rhododendron nectar. Tingling numbness, cardiac arrhythmia, altered consciousness. Ancient poison used for warfare and ritual.

narrative_template.general: Sweetness conceals poison. Your heart skips an unknown number of beats. The honey was a mistake and you knew it.

henbane.name: Henbane
henbane.effects_summary: Ancient anticholinergic used by witches and oracles. Induces trance, hallucination of flight, and encounters with the dead.

narrative_template.general: The dead are nearby. You can almost hear what they are saying. The smoke is yellow and you should not breathe it but you already have.

iboga.name: Iboga
iboga.effects_summary: Bwiti initiatory plant from Gabon. 36-hour ceremony that is also a death and also a birth. Your ancestors will have opinions.

narrative_template.general: The forest is inside you. You are shown everything you have avoided knowing. There is no shortcut through the ceremony.

ibogaine.name: Ibogaine
ibogaine.effects_summary: Isolated iboga alkaloid used for addiction interruption. Produces terrifying clarity about every decision you have made.

narrative_template.general: The drug shows you the drug. Then it shows you why. Then it shows you what you were before the why. You have 30 hours.

iproniazid.name: Iproniazid
iproniazid.effects_summary: First MAOI antidepressant, discovered accidentally from tuberculosis treatment. Raises serotonin slowly, powerfully, and dangerously if combined incorrectly.

narrative_template.general: The grey thins. Not all at once — over weeks, the light changes. You remember you were capable of this.

kava.name: Kava
kava.effects_summary: Pacific island root producing muscular relaxation and mild euphoria without cognitive impairment. The Pentacles rest easy.

narrative_template.general: Your muscles become water. Social fear dissolves. The ceremony circle has always been safe. You remember this.

ketamine.name: Ketamine
ketamine.effects_summary: Anesthetic dissociative producing the K-hole — complete ego dissolution into grey geometric space. You leave your body and watch it from the ceiling.

narrative_template.general: You are watching yourself from a great distance. The body is doing something. You will return to it eventually.

khat.name: Khat
khat.effects_summary: Flowering plant chewed in Yemen and East Africa for stimulation, sociality, and communal endurance. Slow burn. Used since antiquity.

narrative_template.general: The circle chews and talks. Hours pass. The green loosens your tongue and steadies your mind.

kratom.name: Kratom
kratom.effects_summary: Southeast Asian leaf with dose-dependent effects: stimulant at low dose, opioid-like sedation at high dose. Walks both sides of the boundary.

narrative_template.general: A warm tide. Whether it lifts you or draws you down depends entirely on the measure. The leaf is listening.

kwao krua.name: Kwao Krua
kwao krua.effects_summary: Thai phytoestrogen plant used for feminisation and longevity. Slow hormonal alchemy through botanical channels.

narrative_template.general: The plant rearranges what was already trying to change. Time is the active ingredient. You are its patient.

kykeon.name: Kykeon
kykeon.effects_summary: Mystery beverage of the Eleusinian Mysteries. Possibly ergotised barley — proto-LSD consumed by Plato, Aristotle, and 10,000 initiates who never spoke of it.

narrative_template.general: This is what Plato saw. The eternal forms behind the shadow play. Philosophy was never the same after this cup.

lamotrigine.name: Lamotrigine
lamotrigine.effects_summary: Anticonvulsant mood stabilizer used for bipolar disorder. Smooths the amplitude without eliminating the signal.

narrative_template.general: The sharp edges of the world are slightly further away than usual. This is medical. This is survival. This is enough.

lithium.name: Lithium
lithium.effects_summary: The oldest mood stabilizer. A simple metal ion. Poets have taken it. What remained was still worth reading.

narrative_template.general: The peaks no longer reach the stratosphere. The valleys are survivable. You call this flat. Others call it living.

m-cat.name: M-Cat
m-cat.effects_summary: Mephedrone — synthetic cathinone producing intense stimulation, empathic waves, and compulsive redosing logic. The warehouse experience.

narrative_template.general: Electric warmth floods the jaw. The music becomes urgent. You will absolutely not take another one.

mandrake.name: Mandrake
mandrake.effects_summary: Tropane alkaloid root used in medieval witchcraft and Arab magic. Induces trance, hallucination, and the sensation that the root screams when pulled.

narrative_template.general: The root has a face. You are becoming the forest it came from. Do not follow the figure at the edge of the clearing.

mda.name: MDA
mda.effects_summary: The love drug before MDMA. More psychedelic, more introspective, longer. Visuals appear. Warm empathy coexists with genuine insight.

narrative_template.general: Love is the operating frequency. Your history with everyone you love reshuffles itself into something forgivable.

mdma.name: MDMA
mdma.effects_summary: The empathogen. Rose aura, ripple waves, no paranoia base. The dancefloor becomes a single organism of shared warmth.

narrative_template.general: Your chest is warm. The music is inside you. Everyone here is your family. You are certain of this.

methamphetamine.name: Methamphetamine
methamphetamine.effects_summary: Highly addictive synthetic stimulant. Paranoia, shadow figures, red-black aesthetics. The Devil's bargain — ecstasy that costs exactly everything.

narrative_template.general: The shadows at the window have shapes. Something has been watching you specifically. The peak was twelve hours ago.

mimosa tenuiflora.name: Mimosa Tenuiflora
mimosa tenuiflora.effects_summary: DMT-containing bark used in Amazonian ayahuasca preparation. Maximum visual chaos, sacred geometry, jungle green.

narrative_template.general: Green fractals bloom from the inside of your eyelids. The jungle does not permit spectators.

mmda.name: MMDA
mmda.effects_summary: Methylenedioxyamphetamine — amphetamine with psychedelic properties. Rare and strange. Produces visions and abstract emotional clarity.

narrative_template.general: Something abstract and true is surfacing. You cannot say what it is yet but you feel it approaching with confidence.

morphine.name: Morphine
morphine.effects_summary: The opium alkaloid that made modern medicine possible and ended more lives than any war. Warm, nodding, painless. The Pentacle's dark side.

narrative_template.general: Pain is a distant concept belonging to someone else. You are very warm. The river is carrying you somewhere soft.

nicotine.name: Nicotine
nicotine.effects_summary: The world's most ubiquitous psychoactive. Rapid absorption, brief clarity, immediate craving. The habit that survived modernity.

narrative_template.general: A momentary lucidity. The smoke circles upward. You have 7 minutes of calm that you earned precisely one cigarette at a time.

nos.name: NOS
nos.effects_summary: Nitrous oxide. 90-second dissociation. The world becomes a wub-wub-wub tunnel. It is exactly as silly as it sounds and also briefly transcendent.

narrative_template.general: The music slow-warps into the void. Everything is wuuuUUUUuuu. Reality snaps back with a click. You are fine. Next balloon?

nutmeg.name: Nutmeg
nutmeg.effects_summary: Myristicin-containing spice used in dangerous quantities. Dream visions, slow warp, and lasting confusion. The Moon disorients without illuminating.

narrative_template.general: Twelve hours in you are not sure when this started. The kitchen has a different quality. Your spice rack was a warning.

nymphaea caerulea.name: Nymphaea Caerulea
nymphaea caerulea.effects_summary: Blue Egyptian water lily. Sacred to ancient Egypt. Produces dreamy, sensual altered states and mild visual distortion.

narrative_template.general: The blue lotus opens inside you. Egypt is very old and so is this feeling. You float on sacred water.

ololiuqui.name: Ololiuqui
ololiuqui.effects_summary: Morning glory seeds containing LSA — the Aztec sacrament. Slower and heavier than LSD, with dark introspective undertones.

narrative_template.general: The ancient seed opens inside you. The Aztec night sky rotates above the pyramid. You understand the calendar now.

opium.name: Opium
opium.effects_summary: The raw poppy sap. The substance of Coleridge and De Quincey and the British Empire. Dreams within dreams, heavy as mud.

narrative_template.general: The world liquefies at the edges. You are writing the poem you always meant to write. Tomorrow you will try again.

piracetam.name: Piracetam
piracetam.effects_summary: First synthetic nootropic (racetam class). Subtle cognitive enhancement — thoughts arrive slightly faster and connect with less friction.

narrative_template.general: A mild cognitive tailwind. Your sentences complete themselves more efficiently. The cypherpunk approved of this.

pituri.name: Pituri
pituri.effects_summary: Australian indigenous chewing plant containing nicotine and anabasine. Used for ceremonies, long journeys, and endurance across the desert.

narrative_template.general: The desert doesn't wait for you to be ready. The plant knows this. You chew and walk on.

poppers.name: Poppers
poppers.effects_summary: Alkyl nitrites. 90-second rush of blood vessel dilation, head-swimming euphoria, and a rainbow flash across the dancefloor. Queer history is encoded in this bottle.

narrative_template.general: The rainbow hits. Your veins are a dancefloor. Stonewall is in this molecule. You know it when you feel it.

psilacetin.name: Psilacetin
psilacetin.effects_summary: 4-AcO-DMT — synthetic prodrug of psilocin. Chemically elegant, smoother than mushrooms, same depth. Maximum chromatic aberration.

narrative_template.general: The geometry is precise. Each pattern fits inside the next with mathematical intention. Someone or something designed this.

psilocybin mushrooms.name: Psilocybin Mushrooms
psilocybin mushrooms.effects_summary: The oldest known sacrament. Produces wonder, ego dissolution, visual fractals, and the overwhelming sense that everything is going to be okay.

narrative_template.general: The ceiling breathes. Everything is made of golden light. You are exactly where you are supposed to be. This has always been the case.

psychotria viridis.name: Psychotria Viridis
psychotria viridis.effects_summary: The chacruna leaf — DMT plant component of ayahuasca. Beautiful, dangerous, sacred. Jungle fractals and ancestral communication.

narrative_template.general: Green light through jungle canopy. The leaf has been waiting for exactly this ceremony. Your ancestors are present and have notes.

sakae na.name: Sakae Na
sakae na.effects_summary: Southeast Asian plant (Combretum quadrangulare) with mild stimulant and euphoric properties. Regional cousin of kratom.

narrative_template.general: A light wash of warmth. Not demanding. The plant offers what the region has always offered — gentle endurance.

sassafras.name: Sassafras
sassafras.effects_summary: Safrole-containing root bark used as MDMA precursor. Mild empathogenic effects in raw form. Native American sacred plant.

narrative_template.general: Root medicine. Warm and social and older than the category they put it in. The forest offered this before the lab did.

scopolamine.name: Scopolamine
scopolamine.effects_summary: Tropane alkaloid used in motion sickness patches and in Colombian criminal practice. Produces complete suggestibility and total amnesia.

narrative_template.general: You will do what you are told and remember nothing. The tropane alkaloid has no opinion about your preferences.

sertraline.name: Sertraline
sertraline.effects_summary: SSRI antidepressant (Zoloft). Slow serotonin accumulation over weeks. Not a party drug — this is maintenance medicine for the long game.

narrative_template.general: You took this every day for four months and then someone made a joke and you actually laughed. That was the sign.

shroom tea.name: Shroom Tea
shroom tea.effects_summary: Psilocybin mushroom infusion — faster onset, nausea-reduced, same depth. The ceremony vessel changes the relationship with the medicine.

narrative_template.general: The warm cup. The steam. Then the floor breathes and the walls decide to show you something you've been avoiding.

sildenafil.name: Sildenafil
sildenafil.effects_summary: Erectile dysfunction medication (Viagra). Vasodilator producing flushing, visual blue tinge, and the confidence of pharmaceutical certainty.

narrative_template.general: Everything takes on a subtle blue haze. This was discovered by accident in 1989. So was penicillin.

sober.name: Sober
sober.effects_summary: The most radical choice in certain rooms. Complete presence. You feel everything exactly as it is. This is its own altered state.

narrative_template.general: You see all of it with no filter. The music is real. The people are real. So is the next morning. This is Temperance.

st. john's wort.name: St. John's Wort
st. john's wort.effects_summary: Gentle botanical MAOI and serotonin modulator. Slower than pharmaceuticals. The herb that made some poets function in summer.

narrative_template.general: Yellow flowers in the sunshine. The grey lifts by degrees, like clouds after rain. You have been here before — summer of three years ago.

sugarcane.name: Sugarcane
sugarcane.effects_summary: Raw glucose — the sweetness that fueled empire and slavery. Sugar is the most globally consumed psychoactive. The Pentacle's most honest expression.

narrative_template.general: Sweetness hits the tongue first, then the blood. A brief, honest warmth. The simplest molecule with the longest shadow.

syrian rue.name: Syrian Rue
syrian rue.effects_summary: MAOI seeds used in ancient Middle East and Persia. Potentiates other substances and produces visionary states alone at high dose.

narrative_template.general: The gate opens between what you swallow and what you were meant to experience. Old medicine in old desert light.

tabernaemontana.name: Tabernaemontana
tabernaemontana.effects_summary: African shrub with iboga-like alkaloids. Used in Bwiti initiation. The forest has always known what the laboratory is still learning.

narrative_template.general: The initiation begins in the forest before the ceremony. You have not yet begun and you are already changed.

tea.name: Tea
tea.effects_summary: L-theanine and caffeine in elegant balance. Civilization's most persistent ritual. The clarity is softer than coffee. The pause is deliberate.

narrative_template.general: The steam rises. The mind settles. Ten thousand years of ritual in a ceramic cup. This pause was planned.

testosterone.name: Testosterone
testosterone.effects_summary: Masculinizing hormone producing slow physical and perceptual transformation. The body renegotiates its relationship with the world.

narrative_template.general: The voice drops. The hunger sharpens. Months become years become a body that is finally the right size for the soul inside it.

thc edibles.name: THC Edibles
thc edibles.effects_summary: 11-hydroxy-THC — the liver's interpretation of cannabis. Slower, deeper, and more committed than smoking. You are in this for several hours.

narrative_template.general: It wasn't working. Then it was working. Now it is working very much. The ceiling is a different texture than earlier.

tobacco.name: Tobacco
tobacco.effects_summary: Sacred plant of the Americas, colonised into commodity. Ceremonially irreplaceable. The smoke carries prayers. The addiction carries everything else.

narrative_template.general: The smoke circles. Before it was product it was prayer. The sacred plant still remembers what it was before the trade routes.

weed.name: Weed
weed.effects_summary: Cannabis — time-distorting, music-deepening, creativity-adjacent. The bong cloud is warm and the couch receives you completely.

narrative_template.general: Time stretches like taffy. The music has detail you missed every previous listen. The snack decision feels extremely important.

xanax.name: Xanax
xanax.effects_summary: Benzodiazepine anxiolytic producing profound relaxation and the terrifying warmth of borrowed calm. Withdrawal is not a joke.

narrative_template.general: The anxiety is gone. Not managed — gone. You understand now why people take more. You will not take more. You take more.

yohimbe.name: Yohimbe
yohimbe.effects_summary: Bark-derived alpha-2 antagonist producing anxiety-adjacent stimulation, aphrodisiac effects, and cardiovascular urgency.

narrative_template.general: The heart accelerates. Urgency without direction. The body is preparing for something. You are not sure you agreed to this.
